daos

Class ReactionDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • daos.DAO
      • daos.ReactionDAO

  • public class ReactionDAO
extends DAO
    The ReactionDAO class provides access to the reaction table in the database.
    Version:
    1.0 04 Apr 2020
    Author:
    Brian Goh

    • Method Detail

      • addReaction

        public boolean addReaction(Thread thread,
                           Reaction reaction)
        Adds a reaction by a user to a thread
        Parameters:
        thread - thread that user reacted to
        reaction - reaction that was posted
        Returns:
        true upon successful addition, false otherwise

      • getLikes

        public java.util.List<Reaction> getLikes(Thread thread)
        Returns list of likes for a specified thread
        Parameters:
        thread - thread to retrieve likes from
        Returns:
        list of reaction objects which are likes for a thread

      • getDislikes

        public java.util.List<Reaction> getDislikes(Thread thread)
        Returns list of dislikes for a specified thread
        Parameters:
        thread - thread to retrieve dislikes from
        Returns:
        list of reaction objects which are dislikes for a thread

      • updateReaction

        public boolean updateReaction(Thread thread,
                              Reaction reaction)
        Update a reaction in a thread, such as from like to dislike or vice-versa
        Parameters:
        thread - thread that contains the reaction
        reaction - updated reaction
        Returns:
        true upon successful update, false otherwise

      • deleteReaction

        public boolean deleteReaction(Thread thread,
                              Reaction reaction)
        Delete a specified reaction from thread
        Parameters:
        thread - thread to delete reaction from
        reaction - reaction to delete
        Returns:
        true upon successful deletion, false otherwise
